description: Keep your favourite USB powered devices juiced up and ready to go. The Flip 30 Recharger has a powerful 7,800mAh battery to keep your devices going, and you can charge it while you charge your other devices.Li-NMC  (lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide) battery offers lower energy density, but a longer life and better inherent safety.Input is USB A male, 5V, up to 1.5A (7.5W max).Output is USB A female, 5V, up to 2.1A (10.5W max), regulated.Keep it plugged in or top it up every 3-6 months.Charge time via USB is about 5 hours.Operating usage range is 0 to 40°C.Charging and low-battery protection built-in.Charging status light.
name: Goal Zero Flip 30 Recharger
